text:
@George_Osborne @MattHancock He didn't 'succeed'. He massaged the numbers. https://t.co/tqdjc7R8bh. This would suggest he's at least 20% under target. 

Bottom line: you are not being a good friend defending his failings on this score, and you are gaslighting the country. Stop it.
